comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: hard to say why she would be in the Bain period here, she was too obsolete to even use (she was classed as a "protected cruiser")  Laid up in 1904, she and her sister HM Powerful had most of their armament removed and were used as troop transports in WWI

comment.author: 61415649@N04
comment._content: I was just looking at a shot of this vintage ship in Esquimalt harbour, in the early 1900's! mrdot.
